choco_latte.name: Choco-Latte
choco_latte.desc: Used to be popular in ancient times. Discussion is still ongoing on whether it was a food or a drink. Regardless, many packages of this ancient curiosity are still around, perfectly fit for consumption.

spice.name: Spice
spice.desc: A rare substance, only produced on the planet Arrakis. In its unprocessed form it's lethal, but those who learn to use it can gain great mental powers.

psi.name: Psi
psi.desc: Powerful mental stimulant rumored to give psychic powers to those using it.

jelly_beans.name: Jelly Beans
jelly_beans.desc: A popular snack in ancient times.

acid.name: Acid
acid.desc: The juice of the rocktopus plant. Extremely caustic, do not touch!
